Atra Programming Language

the page made by ai does not reflect real information

A modern, intuitive programming language designed for rapid HTML generation

Atra revolutionizes web development by providing a clean, readable syntax that compiles directly to HTML. Write less, build faster, and maintain cleaner codebases with reusable components and intuitive structure.

‚ú® Key Features

  • üöÄ Fast Development - Intuitive syntax that mirrors HTML structure
  • üß© Component Reusability - Define once, use everywhere with variable components
  • ‚ö° Lightning Compilation - Instant compilation to clean, standards-compliant HTML
  • üõ†Ô∏è Developer Friendly - Clear error messages and excellent debugging support
  • üåç Cross Platform - Works seamlessly on Windows, macOS, and Linux
  • üîß Extensible - Plugin system for custom functionality

Your First Atra Program

Create a file named hello.atra and write your first program using Atra's syntax.

Compile it using the Atra CLI to generate the corresponding HTML file.

This simple workflow allows rapid development of clean HTML documents.

üìñ Syntax Guide

Atra's syntax closely mirrors HTML structure, supporting elements, attributes, text content, and nesting.

It also supports reusable components for modular and maintainable code.

üèóÔ∏è Advanced Examples

Atra supports building complete web pages, including headers, navigation, main content, and footers.

Reusable components enable scalable and consistent UI design.

üõ†Ô∏è CLI Commands

Use the Atra CLI for compiling, watching, formatting, and checking your Atra source files.
